filmography.title: Ecstasy
filmography.role_description: A young bride who leaves her impotent husband and finds passion with a stranger, sparking international controversy.
filmography.plot: A young woman marries an older man but finds true passion with a young engineer, leading to scandal.

filmography.title: Algiers
filmography.role_description: A beautiful French tourist who captivates the thief Pepe le Moko in the Casbah; Lamarr's Hollywood debut.
filmography.plot: A notorious French jewel thief hiding in the Casbah of Algiers risks his safety when he falls for a beautiful tourist.

filmography.title: Lady of the Tropics
filmography.role_description: A mixed-race woman in Saigon who longs to visit Paris and tragically falls in love with an American playboy.
filmography.plot: An American playboy in Saigon marries a local beauty, but their love is threatened by prejudice and a scheming tycoon.

filmography.title: I Take This Woman
filmography.role_description: A glamorous model who enters a marriage of convenience with a doctor but eventually falls for him.
filmography.plot: A doctor marries a beautiful model to save her from a scandal, hoping she will eventually learn to love him.

filmography.title: Boom Town
filmography.role_description: A sophisticated corporate spy and 'other woman' who complicates the lives of two wildcat oil drillers.
filmography.plot: Two friends strike oil in Texas, but their partnership is threatened by their rivalry over a woman and business success.

filmography.title: Comrade X
filmography.role_description: A Soviet streetcar conductor with ideals who is charmed by an American reporter in this screwball comedy.
filmography.plot: An American reporter in Russia is forced to smuggle a beautiful tram conductor out of the country.

filmography.title: Come Live with Me
filmography.role_description: A Viennese refugee who arranges a marriage of convenience with a struggling writer to avoid deportation.
filmography.plot: A refugee facing deportation marries a struggling author to stay in the country, but love complicates their arrangement.

filmography.title: Ziegfeld Girl
filmography.role_description: The beautiful wife of a violinist who is discovered by Ziegfeld and struggles with the temptations of fame.
filmography.plot: Three women from different backgrounds are hired to be Ziegfeld Girls, and the job changes their lives in different ways.

filmography.title: H.M. Pulham, Esq.
filmography.role_description: A modern career woman who becomes the one great love of a stuffy Boston businessman's life.
filmography.plot: A wealthy Bostonian looks back on his life and the beautiful advertising copywriter he loved but didn't marry.
filmography.awards: Often cited as her best performance

filmography.title: Tortilla Flat
filmography.role_description: A fiery Portuguese cannery worker who catches the eye of the local vagabonds in this Steinbeck adaptation.
filmography.plot: A group of poor but carefree friends in Monterey, California, navigate life, love, and wine when one of them inherits property.

filmography.title: Crossroads
filmography.role_description: The devoted wife of a French diplomat who stands by him when he is blackmailed over a past he cannot remember.
filmography.plot: A diplomat suffering from amnesia is blackmailed by criminals who claim he is a notorious thief.

filmography.title: White Cargo
filmography.role_description: A seductive native woman who drives men on a rubber plantation mad with desire; famous for the line 'I am Tondelayo.'
filmography.plot: A man arriving at a remote African rubber plantation is warned to stay away from the native woman Tondelayo.

filmography.title: The Heavenly Body
filmography.role_description: The neglected wife of an astronomer who turns to astrology and romance to get his attention.
filmography.plot: An astronomer's wife consults an astrologer who predicts she will meet a new love, causing chaos in her marriage.

filmography.title: The Conspirators
filmography.role_description: A mysterious woman involved with the anti-Nazi underground in Lisbon who aids a Dutch resistance fighter.
filmography.plot: A Dutch resistance fighter escapes to Lisbon and joins a group of conspirators plotting against the Nazis.

filmography.title: Experiment Perilous
filmography.role_description: A beautiful woman terrorized by her jealous, controlling husband in a turn-of-the-century thriller.
filmography.plot: A doctor investigates the death of a wealthy woman's sister and discovers her husband is a dangerous psychopath.

filmography.title: Her Highness and the Bellboy
filmography.role_description: A European princess visiting New York who falls for a bellboy, mistaking his kindness for love.
filmography.plot: A bellboy falls for a visiting princess, unaware that his invalid neighbor is secretly in love with him.

filmography.title: The Strange Woman
filmography.role_description: A manipulative and ruthless woman in 19th-century Maine who uses men to gain wealth and power.
filmography.plot: A cruel woman manipulates three men—her husband, his son, and a foreman—to get what she wants.

filmography.title: Dishonored Lady
filmography.role_description: A fashion editor with a scandalous past who tries to start over but is accused of murder.
filmography.plot: A successful art director attempts suicide, starts a new life under a pseudonym, but is dragged back into a murder trial.

filmography.title: Let's Live a Little
filmography.role_description: A psychiatrist who treats a stressed advertising executive, only to fall in love with him.
filmography.plot: A harried ad executive seeks help from a psychiatrist, and the two end up falling in love.

filmography.title: Samson and Delilah
filmography.role_description: The seductive Philistine beauty who discovers the secret of Samson's strength and betrays him.
filmography.plot: When strongman Samson rejects the love of the beautiful Philistine woman Delilah, she seeks vengeance that brings horrible consequences.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Art Direction; Oscar: Win – Best Costume Design

filmography.title: A Lady Without Passport
filmography.role_description: A concentration camp survivor in Havana waiting for entry to the US who becomes involved with a smuggling ring.
filmography.plot: An undercover agent infiltrates a human smuggling ring in Havana and falls for a refugee waiting to enter the US.

filmography.title: Copper Canyon
filmography.role_description: A saloon owner in the Old West who is suspected of leading a gang terrorizing local miners.
filmography.plot: A group of copper miners are terrorized by local bandits, and a saloon owner may be behind it all.

filmography.title: My Favorite Spy
filmography.role_description: A glamorous spy in Tangier who encounters a bumbling comic posing as a secret agent.
filmography.plot: A burlesque comic who looks exactly like a spy is recruited to impersonate him in Tangier.

filmography.title: The Story of Mankind
filmography.role_description: Lamarr portrays the French heroine Joan of Arc in this all-star fantasy drama about the history of humanity.
filmography.plot: The Spirit of Man and the Devil argue over whether humanity is worth saving, using examples from history.

filmography.title: The Female Animal
filmography.role_description: An aging movie star who competes with her own daughter for the love of a handsome extra; Lamarr's final film role.
filmography.plot: A movie star is saved from an accident by an extra, leading to a romance that is complicated by her daughter's interest in him.
